sentences.en: a paradigm for students to copy
Although similar in concept, the ADO. NET objects follow a disconnected paradigm.
sentences.cn: 尽管概念上很相似, 但ADO. NET对象遵循的是一种不连续的范式.

sentences.en: As a critical discourse, hermeneutics has involved a linguistic paradigm.
sentences.cn: 解释学作为一种批评话语一直强调其语言学范式.

sentences.en: Elasticity, solubility, inflammability are paradigm cases of dispositions in natural objects.
sentences.cn: 伸缩性 、 可缩性 、 易燃性是天然物体倾向性的范例.

sentences.en: Grammatically, the Sanskrit paradigm exemplifies the concept of radical.
sentences.cn: 从语法的观点看, 梵语的变格范例明确了词根的概念.

sentences.en: He had become the paradigm of the successful man.
sentences.cn: 他已经成为成功人士的典范。

sentences.en: I intend to ascend into the new paradigm of unity.
sentences.cn: 我意愿提升进入统一新范例.

sentences.en: In fact, the turning imply the transition of teacher education paradigm.
sentences.cn: 这种转向实际是国际教师教育范式的转移.

sentences.en: Stiglitz, Joseph E. " Information and the Change in the Paradigm in Economics. "
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫. 史蒂格利兹,《资讯与经济学的典范变迁 》.

sentences.en: The hierarchy of the Catholic Church realize the magnitude of the paradigm change.
sentences.cn: 天主教堂僧侣统治集团认识到范例改变的份量.

sentences.en: The paradigm is in its narrowest sense a set of rules.
sentences.cn: 范例,就其最狭隘的意义来说,就是一组规则.

sentences.en: The rescue of Bear Stearns, in particular, was a paradigm - changing event.
sentences.cn: 特别是(美联储)挽救贝尔斯登的事件改变了我们的思维模式.

sentences.en: This episode may serve as a paradigm.
sentences.cn: 这一插曲可以充作典型例子.

sentences.en: This is not what honor is within the new unity based paradigm.
sentences.cn: 在立足统一的新范式中,这并不是尊重.

sentences.en: With this shift carries a new paradigm of weather for your planet.
sentences.cn: 随著这次转变,带来了给地球的新的天气模式.

phrases.tran_cn: 典范转移；思考模式的转移

trans.tran_cn: 范例，样式，模范，词形变化表
trans.tran_en: a very clear or typical example of something
